CustomField.formula: If( CONTAINS(Case_Lookup__r.Account.Owner.Manager.Title, "District Sales Manager"), Case_Lookup__r.Account.Owner.Manager.FirstName & " " & Case_Lookup__r.Account.Owner.Manager.LastName, If(CONTAINS(Case_Lookup__r.Account.Owner.Title, "District Sales Manager"), Case_Lookup__r.Account.Owner.FirstName & " " & Case_Lookup__r.Account.Owner.LastName,"") )
CustomField.label: District Sales Manager
